contentPackId.description: The unique Beacon id of this content pack.

gameId.description: Which game this content pack belongs to.

marketplace.description: Which marketplace hosts this content pack.

marketplaceId.description: The unique id of the content pack at its marketplace.

marketplaceUrl.description: The url to the content pack at its marketplace.

userId.description: The UUID of the user who owns the content pack.

name.description: The name of the content pack.

isConfirmed.description: If true, the confirmation process has been completed.

confirmationCode.description: The confirmation code that should be found on the marketplace page.

isConsoleSafe.description: If true, the content pack is safe for consoles.

isDefaultEnabled.description: If true, the content pack will be enabled by default for new Beacon projects.

minVersion.description: Minimum Beacon app version that can support this content pack.

lastUpdate.description: Time of last update as a unix timestamp.

isOfficial.description: If true, this content pack is provided by the official game developers.

isIncludedInDeltas.description: If true, this content pack will be included in delta updates designed for the Beacon app.

gameSpecific.description: Additional game-specific data that does not fit into general-purpose properties.

slug.description: If applicable, the url "slug" for the content pack. Not all marketplaces use url slugs.

required.description: If true, the content pack is cannot be turned off in the Beacon app.
